## [Become a Member Today Click here for details ](../../membership/)

# Membership

[Home](/) > Membership

Why join the Museum? The Lancaster Museum of Art is a vital visual arts resource in the Lancaster Community and the surrounding region. We are committed to making sure that we are accessible to all by maintaining an admission-free facility. Our members help us stay that way. In addition, members are an important part of what makes our galleries vibrant and relevant – your support ensures that we continue to bring the “best available art” to Lancaster. Thank you!

##  Membership Levels:

Individual • $35

Family (2 adults and children up to age 18) • $75

Patron • $125

Contributing • $250

Supporting • $500

The Precisionists • $1,000

Benefactor • $2,500

####  TO JOIN ONLINE PLEASE CLICK HERE

####  CLICK [HERE](../../uploads/Membership_2015.jpg) TO DOWNLOAD THE MEMBERSHIP FORM

##  Give the Gift of Art:

Gift memberships are an excellent way to honor a family member or friend for the holidays, or even a birthday, wedding or anniversary.

Simply fill out the gift membership form with the recipient’s information, and we will do the rest!

##  Membership Questions?
